Posts.Content: Feb 18, 2011 01:14PM healthyboobiesforme wrote: The reason I had a double mastectomy was because I never wanted to hear the words "you have breast cancer' ever again! My doctor told me that your chances of getting breast cancer in the other non-cancer breast raises by 1% every year. I was 26 when I was diagnosed (3 years ago) and that meant that by the time I was 36, I would have a 10% chance of getting it again. For me, it's ease of mind. My new little boobies are healthy. They might not look like my old ones, but they are mine - and a reminder of how strong I was to make such a proactive and smart decision.
Posts.Title: What were the reasons that you had a MX versus a lumpectomy geogal anneflorida
